formElement.label: Server configuration name:
formElement.documentation: Supply the configuration name of the JBoss server. This configuration holds information about the standalone server you want to shut down. The IP and port are supplied by the configuration. If left blank, default controller values (IP and port) will be used for the shutdown attempt. To view or create a new configuration, go to the Administration -> Plugins tab, and select 'Configure' action for @PLUGIN_KEY@ plugin.
formElement.htmlDocumentation:
Supply the configuration name of the JBoss server. This configuration holds information about the standalone server you want to shut down. The IP and port are supplied by the configuration. If left blank, default controller values (IP and port) will be used for the shutdown attempt.
A Configuration defines connection details and can be created by going to plugin configuration page.

formElement.label: Physical location of the jboss client script:
formElement.documentation: Provide the physical location of the admin script, i.e: 'jboss-cli.bat', '/path/to/jboss-cli.sh'. (Required)
